name: General corporation laws, when applicable
text: Except where otherwise provided, the general corporation laws shall apply to cooperative associations organized under this chapter. [L 1949, c 234, pt of §1; am L 1953, c 137, §1(e); RL 1955, §176-27; HRS ; am L 1983, c 167, §17; am L 1985, c 270, §4]
